title: Flexible packaging labels lidding film | Fastik
text: Products Great print results start in the art department! One of the keys to great print results is advanced pre-press technologies. Fastik utilizes the most advanced color management system available in the industry, offering a high degree of print predictability, including digital proofing for 4 color process (CMYK) printing. Complete in-house digital plate making Advanced screening software by Kodak Convert artwork from design to print-ready status Advanced color management-for accurate digital proofing Barcodes that comply to ANSI specifications Design Services Download our artwork guidelines Adobe
